divs: Sighting DetailsA buddy and i were shooting the breeze around a fire late in the evening when a white-blueish light hit us We looked to see where it was coming from, we looked up and just above the treeline and saw the light coming from what i can only assume The center of the source, the source of light was circular in shape with smaller lights encircled around it on the left and right handside of the main light was an orange light which seemed indirect as in not aimed downward as opposed to the main light source The Main Light source kept shooting the bright light down to the ground as if scannning There was absolutely no sound from it came towads us stopped for split second did almost a 180 degree turn then it was gone
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Epsom
There was one other sighting in Epsom on or around August 31st 2008
Summary: the reason i am reporting this to you now is because i intially sent it to the www.nhufo.org and have seen or heard nothing since
